title.narrative: Municipal Economic and Environmental Governance

description.narrative: Municipal Economic and Environmental Governance project overall goal is to support democratic local governance and improve quality of public services, specifically in the economic and environmental sectors.

participating-org.narrative: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.3.3.1

description.narrative: Country has strengthened capacities for governance and oversight of rule of law institutions

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.1.1

description.narrative: National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.1.A.2

description.narrative: Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups People accessing basic services

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.1.G.2

description.narrative: Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Other marginalised people accessing basic services

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.1.C.2

description.narrative: Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Women accessing basic services
